statements.select: ;WITH func_all AS ( SELECT afi.[function_id] ,afi.[parent_function_id] ,afi.[app_id] ,afi.[code] AS func_code ,afi.[name] AS func_name ,afi.[desc] AS func_desc ,afi.[is_enable] AS func_is_enable ,afi.[is_delete] AS func_is_delete ,afi.[create_time] AS func_create_time ,afi.[update_time] AS func_update_time FROM [auth_function_info] afi INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_app_info] aai ON aai.app_id = aai.app_id WHERE afi.[code] = #funcCode# AND aai.code = #appCode# UNION ALL SELECT afi.[function_id] ,afi.[parent_function_id] ,afi.[app_id] ,afi.[code] AS func_code ,afi.[name] AS func_name ,afi.[desc] AS func_desc ,afi.[is_enable] AS func_is_enable ,afi.[is_delete] AS func_is_delete ,afi.[create_time] AS func_create_time ,afi.[update_time] AS func_update_time FROM func_all , [auth_function_info] afi WHERE func_all.[function_id] = afi.[parent_function_id] ) SELECT func_all.[function_id] ,func_all.[parent_function_id] ,func_all.[app_id] ,func_all.func_code ,func_all.func_name ,func_all.func_desc ,func_all.func_is_enable ,func_all.func_is_delete ,func_all.func_create_time ,func_all.func_update_time ,afi.[name] AS func_parent_name ,afi.[code] AS func_parent_code FROM func_all INNER JOIN [auth_function_info] afi ON func_all.[parent_function_id] = afi.[function_id]

SELECT afi.[function_id] ,afi.[parent_function_id] ,afi.[app_id] ,afi.[code] AS func_code ,afi.[name] AS func_name ,afi.[desc] AS func_desc ,afi.[is_enable] AS func_is_enable ,afi.[is_delete] AS func_is_delete ,afi.[create_time] AS func_create_time ,afi.[update_time] AS func_update_time ,afi_parent.[name] AS func_parent_name ,CASE WHEN afi_parent.function_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' THEN 'func_root' ELSE afi_parent.[code] END AS func_parent_code FROM [auth_function_info] afi INNER JOIN [auth_function_info] afi_parent ON afi.[parent_function_id] = afi_parent.[function_id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_app_info] aai ON aai.app_id = afi.app_id WHERE afi_parent.[code] = #funcParentCode# AND aai.code = #appCode#

SELECT afi.[function_id] ,afi.[parent_function_id] ,afi.[app_id] ,afi.[code] AS func_code ,afi.[name] AS func_name ,afi.[desc] AS func_desc ,afi.[is_enable] AS func_is_enable ,afi.[is_delete] AS func_is_delete ,afi.[create_time] AS func_create_time ,afi.[update_time] AS func_update_time FROM [auth_function_info] afi INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_app_info] aai ON aai.app_id = afi.app_id WHERE afi.parent_function_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AND aai.code = #value#

SELECT afi.[function_id] ,afi.[parent_function_id] ,afi.[app_id] ,afi.[code] AS func_code ,afi.[name] AS func_name ,afi.[desc] AS func_desc ,afi.[is_enable] AS func_is_enable ,afi.[is_delete] AS func_is_delete ,afi.[create_time] AS func_create_time ,afi.[update_time] AS func_update_time FROM [auth_function_info] afi INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_app_info] aai ON aai.app_id = afi.app_id WHERE afi.[code] = #funcCode# AND aai.code = #appCode#
